patchName: Open Beta 26 - Goddess Of Strife Update
summary: Discordia ported to SMITE 2. New Wandering Market Travelers (Corebreaker Ares, Blind Vengeance Nemesis, Crimson Mist Eset). New anti-crit item Spectral Visage. Major item shifts moving Attack Damage to basic attack items. Jungle starter nerfs and lifesteal item nerfs.

description: Ranged Basic Attacks
Damage Type: Magical
Scaling Type: Intelligence Scaling
The God on your team with the highest damage dealt to the enemy gods gains a buff of Strength and Intelligence.
Gaining a level or a god kill/assist provides a random temporary buff of Intelligence, Lifesteal or Healing.
Fire out an orb of unruly magic dealing Magical Damage.
After reaching the target location, it explodes in a small area dealing Magical Damage before breaking into bouncing minor projectiles that each deal Magical Damage.
Create an area that deals Magical Damage
Hitting one enemy causes them to be rooted, hitting multiple causes them to attack their nearest ally for Magical Damage.
Leap and create a field in an area. While within the field you gain Stealth, Movement Speed and your ability cooldowns are decreased.
Dealing damage to enemy gods while within the field increases its duration
Throw the Golden Apple of Discord which deals Magical Damage before exploding in an area dealing Magical Damage and spreading the effects of the apple.
Enemies afflicted by the apple effect are crippled and trembled
Enemies caught in the explosion take initial damage and a burst of damage at the end of the effect, but do not explode in an area
Release Date: January 16th
Contest of Gods only provides you extra Attack Damage from Intelligence.
Unruly Magic does not explode but returns back, dealing damage and providing a stack causing your next attacks to explode.
Erratic Behavior no longer creates a field of stealth but attack speed and attack damage.
Golden Apple of Discord is faster and does not spread.
Increased Damage Mitigation while Active: 7/9/11/13/15% -> 15%
The Scales description and functionality has been updated to be easier to understand, along with some balance changes.
Anubis starts the game with 2% Lifesteal and 10 Protections.
Gain additional Bonus Lifesteal and Protections scaled from missing health.
Caps at +6% Lifesteal and 20 Protections at 20% Health.
NEW: The Scales is always at full strength during his Ultimate.
Decreased Base Attack Damage: 42 -> 39
Decreased Permanent Bonus Damage Scaling: 2% -> 1%
Note: Aspect Slow is unchanged.
Note: The Aspect Damage is unchanged.
Note: The Aspect Damage is unchanged.
Fixed an issue where this was not healing minions.
Removed Strength Reduction: 5% -> 0%
Removed Intelligence Reduction: 5% -> 0%
Added Damage Reduction: 0% -> 5%
This will be more universally applicable, as it will affect base damage and will work more potently in the early game.
NEW: Enemies who are blighted now have their blight strengthened for 6s, increasing the Damage Reduction to 10%.
Medusa's Intelligence vs. Strength scaling largely came at the cost of her old playstyle; a style that more intrinsically combined strong attack damage with strong ability pressure.
After iterating on Strength and Intelligence as a core mechanic in Smite 2, we've found we prefer hybrid scaling that pushes new playstyles rather than simply splitting attack vs. ability damage.
While we may revisit Medusa more comprehensively in the future, these Strength adjustments will bring her closer to her tried-and-true identity.
Fixed an issue where her tooltips did not show the proper information when in the non-expanded view.
Increased Damage Over Time: 10/15/20/25/30 -> 12/19/26/33/40
Increased Strength Scaling: 50% -> 65%
Increased Strength Scaling: 65% -> 80%
Increased Strength Scaling when not facing Medusa: 55% -> 70%
Increased Attack Speed Per Stack Per Level: 0.1% -> 0.2%
Increased Outer Strength Scaling: 12.5% -> 17.5%
Increased Outer Intelligence Scaling: 15% -> 20%
Increased Buildup Time: 0.7s -> 0.9s (Aspect Only)
Fixed an issue where the Cooldown for this ability was actually 12/11.5/10/10.5/10s instead of the intended 12s.
Increased Cooldown: 12s -> 14s (Aspect Only)
Decreased Base Damage Bonus: 20% -> 10%
Increased Scaling Reduction: 20% -> 25%
Fixed an issue where the heal was not targeting the lowest health actor.
It now chooses the target with the most missing percent health.

items.name: Spectral Visage
items.recipe: Medal of Disruption + Circle of Protection + 700g

changes.description: Enemies within 8.8m: -25% Attack Speed, Deal -25% Damage with Critical Strikes
Does not stack with Spectral Armor.
Dev Note: This is more of a temporary solution. We have some things we are working on that we think will be a better long term answer; but want to facilitate anti-crit against Magical Damage.
We are seeing Junglers have too strong of an impact in the very early stages of the game; both in the potency of their ganks and how much farm they can accumulate.
Decreased Area Bonus Damage to Jungle Monsters: 20% -> 15%
Decreased Damage Buffed Attack deals to Jungle Monsters: 90 -> 70
Fixed an issue where this was not triggering off all assists properly.
Fixed an issue where the assist could trigger on a death you did not get an assist on in rare cases.
Does not stack with Spectral Visage.
Now builds from Machu Bow + Hunter's Bow + 800 gold
Now builds from Manchu Bow + Hunter's Bow + 900 gold
Decreased Non Ultimate Cooldown Reduction on Assists: 3s -> 1.5s
Decreased Ultimate Cooldown Reduction on Assists: 10s -> 5s
Fixed a description issue where it did not describe its Anti-Shield capabilities.

description: Base Teleporters now bring you to the next teleport location if the current teleport target dies
Fire Giant now spawns 1min after the Naga dies, down from 5min (the latest it can now spawn is 19:00, previously 23:00)
Totem now grants all teammates of its killer with a global +4 Mana Regeneration and +5% Movement Speed buff for 8s

changes.description: Increased Minion spawn frequency from every 30s to every 22s

bugFixes.description: Fixed Surrender / Pause vote would cause the scoreboard to flicker on gamepad
Relic Selection should now show Mote of Chaos
Base Relic and Upgraded Relics are now broken apart to separate grids in the build panel
Fixed an issue where clearing the filter then opening another screen (ex: Scoreboard) would scroll the item store to their previous selected item
Grids in build panel should now always be sorted by Price/Name

bugFixes.name: Gods
bugFixes.description: The cast mode issues with aspects like Cabrakan should be resolved
Fixed an issue where Relic in inventory not being selectable on gamepad

qualityOfLife.name: HUD Optimizations
description: Improved HUD optimizations
Improvements to physics memory optimization

qualityOfLife.name: Curio Purchase
description: Curio now easier to purchase in the store

qualityOfLife.name: Controls
description: Unpause binding swapped to F5 to help prevent accidental press during vote panel
Minimap Pinging will now always center the cursor on gamepad
Agility Relic Setting - Lets you choose if you want to use the alternate shift keybind or if you want to use the standard relic keybinds
